This person will review requirements, create test cases and build the test automation for our desktop- (C++) and web (Java, PHP) applications. Collaborate with development and QA teams in The United States and Ukraine. This position requires a strong team player that thrives in a fast-paced and fluid environment. Primary Responsibilities: - Create test plans for new projects- Participate in t…

The Customer Service Representative is responsible for the administrative processes within the Customer Service department. The role is positioned within the Customer Service and Procurement team and includes the following main tasks: - Handling of incoming customer and distributor requests by phone and e-mail, including follow up internally and externally - Order entry of all sales orders received via different sources (e-mail, web, fax) - Create purchase orders, including sample purchases - P…
results.title: Customer Service Representative - Native level German speaker
Project engineer
results.description: Ben jij die gedreven en ambitieuze project engineer die op zoek is naar een organisatie waar groei, ontwikkeling en betrokkenheid voorop staan? Dan zijn wij op zoek naar jou Als project engineer ben je verantwoordelijk voor de communicatie met de klant, technische documentatie en de begeleiding van inspecties. Daarnaast houd jij je bezig met de coördinatie en beheer van projecten en het bewaken van de voortgang van projecten. Tevens controleer en bewaak je de technische en budgettaire aspecten.…
